Title: Mid-Western Assassin
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Todd Kubrak (executive story editor), Joshua Green (story editor), Todd Kubrak
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Cheyenne Jackson, Billie Lourd
Plot: Ally takes Meadow to Dr. Rudy to confirm her story about the cult; An unexpected opponent runs against Kai in the city council election.
